name: Warp wants to be the terminal of the future with Zach Lloyd, founder of Warp (The Changelog #487)
summary: Today we’re talking with Zach Lloyd, founder of Warp — the terminal being re-imagined for the 21st century and beyond. Warp is a blazingly fast, rust-based terminal that’s being designed from the ground up to work like a modern app. We get into all the details — why now is the right time to re-invent the terminal, wher...
